About Drombler ACP

Drombler ACP (Abstract Client Platform) is a GUI toolkit agnostic abstract Rich Client Platform (RCP) based on Maven and OSGi. You can use this POM file e.g. in your dependencyManagement section to manage your Drombler ACP dependencies.

Project Modules

This project has declared the following modules:

Name Description
Drombler ACP - Parent The parent POM of the Drombler ACP (Abstract Client Platform) project. This Drombler ACP Parent POM should be the parent (either directly or indirectly) of every Drombler ACP project unless there is a good reason to do otherwise (in which case the reason should be documented).
Drombler ACP - Startup - Main The main classes to startup a Drombler ACP based application.
Drombler ACP - Core - Application Core Drombler ACP Application classes.
Drombler ACP - Core - Commons Drombler ACP utility classes.
Drombler ACP - Core - Action Declarative actions, menus and toolbars support for Drombler ACP.
Drombler ACP - Core - Action - SPI SPI for declarative actions, menus and toolbars support based on Drombler ACP.
Drombler ACP - Core - Data Declarative data support for Drombler ACP.
Drombler ACP - Core - Data - SPI Declarative data support for Drombler ACP.
Drombler ACP - Core - Docking A declarative, modular and GUI toolkit agnostic, abstract Docking Framework.
Drombler ACP - Core - Docking - SPI SPI for building a declarative and modular Docking Framework.
Drombler ACP - Core - Docking - SPI - L10N - German L10n (German) for the SPI for building a declarative and modular Docking Framework.
Drombler ACP - Core - Standard - Action Standard core Actions.
Drombler ACP - Core - Standard - Action - Data - File - L10N - German L10n (German) for the standard core Actions.
Drombler ACP - Core - Standard - Action - Data - File Standard core Actions.
Drombler ACP - Core - Standard - Action - L10N - German L10n (German) for the standard core Actions.
Drombler ACP - Core - Standard - Docking Standard core Docking Framework configurations.
Drombler ACP - L10N - All L10n of Drombler ACP. You can use this POM file e.g. in your dependencies section to manage your Drombler ACP L10n dependencies.
Drombler ACP - L10N - German L10n (German) of Drombler ACP.
Drombler ACP - Docs This project provides the Drombler ACP Documentation.
